mapper.select: select year, term, lecture_no, course_no, question_no, file_nm, save_file_nm, finish_yn, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date from course where 1=1 and lecture_no = #{lecture_no} and course_no = #{course_no}
mapper.insert: insert into course ( year, term, lecture_no, course_no, question_no, file_nm, save_file_nm, finish_yn, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date ) values ( '2020', '1', #{lecture_no}, #{course_no}, #{question}, #{file_nm}, #{save_file_nm}, #{finish_yn}, #{id}, NOW(), #{id}, NOW() )
mapper.update: update course set year = '2020', term = '1', lecture_no = #{lecture_no}, course_no = #{course_no}, question = #{question}, file_nm = #{file_nm}, save_file_nm = #{save_file_nm}, finish_yn = #{finish_yn}, update_id = #{id}, update_date = NOW()
